About this blog

Ket : purebred Brussels inhabitant, a Brussels ~. A blog by Kevin Van Lierde about all kinds of stuff. Webstuff, lame stuff, interesting stuff, Belgium stuff. Stuffed turkey (lame, I told you).. Get to know this guy's occupations & bad habits.
